## About the author

This tutorial was creating during the Fall 2024 semester by Huyen Huynh.

Huyen is a MS graduate student at VCU and a graduate of VCU Computer Science in Spring 2024.

## About the site

The site is built using [quarto](https://quarto.org).

The site is delivered using [github-pages](https://pages.github.com/)

Quarto and gh-pages [work together](https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/github-pages.html) very nicely!

[Source for this site](https://github.com/vcu-ssg/ssg-quarto-docker-tutorial) is maintained on Github.
